findOutIfTheVolunteerCanDoJob

public void findOutIfTheVolunteerCanDoJob(Volunteer volunteer,
                                          int jobIndex)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
Asks the user via console if the given volunteer can do the job at the given job index. Then sets the answer in the given volunteers potential jobs list.

Parameters:
volunteer - the volunteer asked
precondition: volunteer cannot be null
jobIndex - the job index of the job the volunteer is asked about
Throws:
java.io.IOException
